catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 2)
title: Redesigning to Make New Objects
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo wants to make something for his dog to eat. Help him build the tools he needs in the kitchen.

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 4)
title: Communicate with Light and Sound
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel lives across the street from Sofie. What can he build to send messages to her?

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 4)
title: Classify and Choose Materials
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel got some chickens. Help him build a chicken coop where they’ll be safe and comfortable.

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 3)
title: Pollination
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria saw bees on the flowers of her apple tree. She wonders what they’re doing. Can you help her learn?

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 1)
title: Illumination
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie thinks something is under her bed. Can you help her see it?

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 3)
title: Transparency
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo wants to make some shade on a sunny day. What materials should he use? Help him find out.

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 2)
title: Musical Vibration
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria plays piano. She wants to make more music. Can you build her something to play on?

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 1)
title: Habitats
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie learned about the places giraffes live. She wonders about the other animals that live there. What about other places? Can you help her learn?

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 5)
title: Using Ideas from Nature
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel, Sofie, Leo, and Maria learned that some lightbulbs were made using ideas from how fireflies make light. Help them learn about other ideas we get from nature.

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 5)
title: Protection from Wind
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel, Sofie, Leo, and Maria felt a strong wind at the park. It blew a lot of the soil away. What could happen to the animals in the park? Can you help the team protect the soil?

title: Jeesun and Jayden Need to Work it Out
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding how actions affect others and resolving conflicts in constructive ways.

title: Jeesun and Jayden Learn That Accidents Happen
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding that accidents are unintentional.

title: Jayden Feels Disappointed
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing and dealing with feelings of disappointment.

title: Maddox Invades Jayden's Space
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Learning about and respecting other people's personal space.

title: Zoey Feels Embarrased
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing the feeling of embarrassment and how to deal with it.

title: Jeesun Feels Left Out
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing and dealing with feelings of jealousy.

title: Jeesun's Anger Monster
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understand how to deal with anger and how to calm down again.

title: Jayden Tries Something New
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding and learning about perseverance.

title: Zoey Takes A Stand
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Develop an understanding that people have different preferences and dealing with disagreements.

title: Maddox Makes Mischief
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding how your behavior affects others.

title: Jeesun's Rotten Day
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing and naming emotions and understanding how to deal with sadness.

title: Explore Helping Machines
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will investigate how machines help people, design their own machines and work together to build different versions.

title: Explore the Face Bricks
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understand different terms for emotions, and how facial expressions and body language show how people are feeling.

title: Meet the Characters
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: An introduction to the preschool teacher, Mrs. Muffin and the children, Jayden, Jeesun, Maddox, and Zoey.

title: Explore Special Machine Parts
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: The objective of this lesson is for children to use spatial awareness to understand how objects move, observe and describe special parts and functions. The children will build a model with a special part and demonstrate how it works.

title: Jayden Feels Anxious
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understand what anxiety means and how to deal with it.

title: Machines with a Purpose
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will design machines or vehicles to solve problems, and build a model to demonstrate how tools help people to solve problems and accomplish tasks.

title: Wheeling Away
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will learn about the function of wheels, and use spatial awareness to understand how wheeled vehicles move.

title: Safety First
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will start to use planning to solve problems, they will get an understanding of how safety elements function and explore the engineering process by designing, building, and testing models.

title: Water Vehicles
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will investigate water vehicles, compare types of vehicles and talk about the function of propellers and anchors.

title: Heavy Load!
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: The objective of this lesson is for children to explore weight, compare objects and use comparative language.

title: Park Project
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: The objective of this lesson is for children to design machines or vehicles to solve problems and to investigate how machines work together to complete a project.

title: First Trip
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: This getting started activity will allow the children to explore the action bricks and different bricks in the set.
categories: STEAM, Creative Exploration, Social Emotional Development, Early Math and Science

title: Moving on Water
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: In this lesson, students will learn about how and why things float, and design and test sails.

title: Remix the Ride
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: It's time to help get an unfinished ride ready for the amusement park!

title: Sail Car
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description:
Ahoy! Build a sail car and explore an invisible push force.
Which sail design will catch the most wind and make your sail car go the farthest?

title: Hockey Practice
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description: Build a hockey player and goalie! Explore how different push and pull forces help make and block penalty shots.

title: Relay Race
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description: Design, build, and test mechanisms that can pass objects to a teammate, creating a fun and exciting relay race!

title: Tightrope Walker
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description: Build a tightrope and help the tightrope walker keep her center of gravity, so she doesn't fall.

title: Dog Obstacle Course
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description: Build an obstacle course for dogs! Describe the push and pull forces that are at work. This lesson will help familiarize your students with the contents of the LEGO® Education BricQ Motion Essential Set. We recommend taking some time before the lesson to show your students what's beneath the white tray, and to explain that the bricks are sorted by color. Students will find the building instructions books under the tray. They'll only need book "A" for this unit.

title: Vacation Stories
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Learn about and understand story elements like plot and events and be able to recall and tell a story.

title: Get Up and Dance
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description: Get up and dance! Explore how different gears push each other and change the dancers' spinning speed in a fun dance competition.

title: Different Ending
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Understand story elements like plot and events and how a story can be changed.

title: My Pet
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Learn about what pets need and be able to express thoughts, ideas and opinions.

title: The Princess and the Pea
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Understand what makes a story and learn about sequence of events: beginning, middle, and end.

title: Little Seed
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Be able to express thoughts, ideas and opinions.

title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Understand narrative structure and learn about sequence of events.

title: Probability
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: In this lesson, students will learn about probability, making predictions, and recording data.

title: Settings
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Learn about story settings and fundamental narrative structure and elements.

title: Characters
subtitle: StoryTales Set
description: Learn about story characters and fundamental narrative structure and elements.

title: Journey - Trouble on the Road
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: In this lesson students will explore and understand various traffic signs and be able to solve common problems on the road.
categories: STEAM, Creative Exploration, Social Emotional Development, Early Math and Science

title: Y-Shaped Track - Conditional Statements
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: In this lesson students will explore and understand that the Y-shaped track provides options and be able to design and optimize solutions.
categories: STEAM, Creative Exploration, Social Emotional Development, Early Math and Science

title: Train Sound
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: In this lesson students will understand the function of each action bricks and how to use them to solve problems.
categories: STEAM, Creative Exploration, Social Emotional Development, Early Math and Science

title: Math - Distance
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: In this lesson students will understand how to measure distance, be able to compare distances and be able to do simple math.
categories: STEAM, Creative Exploration, Social Emotional Development, Early Math and Science

title: Character - Caterpillar
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: The objective with this lesson is for students to understand that the action bricks’ behavior can be changed using the App and with this activity recognize and understand different emotions.
categories: STEAM, Creative Exploration, Social Emotional Development, Early Math and Science

title: Chain Reaction
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: In this lesson, students will learn about cause and effect by creating chain reactions.

title: Welcome to STEAM Park
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: The objective of this lesson is to familiarize students with the STEAM Park set and its characters.

title: Gears
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: In this lesson, students will learn about how gears work.

title: Functional Elements
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: The objective of this lesson is to familiarize students with the special elements in the STEAM Park set.

title: Ramps
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: In this lesson, students will learn about how and why things roll, and predict and measure distances using non-standard units.

title: Performing Arts
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: In this lesson, students will learn about different forms of art, and they will create and role-play a show.

title: O-Shaped Track - Looping
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: The objective of this lesson is for students to explore and understand use of the O-shaped track for repeating sequences.

title: Music - Animal Concert
subtitle: Coding Express Set
description: With this lesson students will be able to recognize different animal sounds and be able to compose a simple melody using digital tools.

title: Snack Stand
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Oh, no! Daniel dropped his snack. Help him get a new one from the snack stand.

title: Underwater Quest
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria is curious to explore life below the sea. How can she get the submarine in and out of the water?

title: Cave Car
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel wonders what lives inside a dark cave. What do you think is hiding in the dark?

title: Raft
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring balance and buoyancy, pushes and pulls and wind energy.

title: Boat Trip
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria and Sofie are going on a boat trip! How will they get their boat into the water?

title: Push Car Derby
subtitle: BricQ Motion Essential
description: Build a spring launcher and a car with a removable brake to explore push and pull forces, and the effects of friction.

title: Seesaw
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring balances and forces, pivots, levers and weight.

title: Car Launcher
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring energy and friction, push and pull, and wheels.

title: Arctic Ride
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo is going on an Arctic adventure to see polar bears. How can he use his snowmobile to get there?

title: Swing
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Applying knowledge and skills related to structures, stability, measuring, and fair testing.

title: Crossing Crocodile River
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Applying knowledge and skills related to structures, stability, measuring, and fair testing.

title: Animal Alarm
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo doesn't want to miss any of the animals walking by his campsite while he's asleep. How can his animal alarm help him?

description: Applying knowledge and skills related to gears and pulleys, stability, and fair testing.

subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Applying knowledge and skills related to wind force, gears or pulleys, rotation, and fair testing.

title: Pinwheel
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring energy and matter, cause and effect and mechanism and explanation.

subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring energy, forces and friction and non-standard measuring.

title: Spinning Tops
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring the effects of gearing, and balanced and unbalanced forces on the movement of an object.

title: Treehouse Camp
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie is looking forward to seeing the moon from her treehouse! How can she open the treehouse roof for a great view of the sky?

title: Ice Hockey Player
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring stability and motion, movement, and energy.

title: Sam's New Dog
subtitle: Early Simple Machines Set
description: Exploring systems and system models, pulley mechanisms and movement.

title: The Great Desert Adventure
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: It’s time for another great adventure. Help the team reach the pyramids!

title: A mini market
subtitle: My XL World
description: It's shopping day!!! What do people buy in Rainbow Town?

title: The Most Amazing Amusement Park
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: It’s time to create your very own amusement park ride!

title: Twirling Teacups
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Round and round! Sofie and Leo are excited to try this new spinning ride today.

title: Volcano Alert
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore the different ways that scientists monitor volcanic activity.

title: Grabbing Objects
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore how prosthetic designs help people with disabilities.

title: The Spinning Ferris Wheel
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential

title: Classic Carousel

description: Create a new spinning ride for Sofie to try!

title: The Fast Lane
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Help Leo enter the amusement park with the Fast Lane!

title: Send Messages
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore how messages can be transferred from one place to another.

title: Additional Preschool Maker Lessons
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: 7 small activities for Maker in Preschool with STEAM Park. Use the Maker design process to try out one or more of the lessons listed below.

title: Make a fun Cannon Game
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: Create a fun cannon game to Mr. Parker’s booth.

title: The Perfect Swing
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria doesn’t want a ride that goes too fast. Do you think the swing will be a perfect fit?

title: Make a machine to help Mr. Bear
subtitle: STEAM Park
description: Create a model to help Mr. Bear get up the stairs. How will you make it safe and fun?

title: Traveling around
subtitle: My XL World
description: People are traveling around Rainbow Town in different types of vehicles!

title: Outdoor activities
subtitle: My XL World
description: Zoe is playing on the merry-go-round with her friends!

title: Healthcare workers
subtitle: My XL World
description: Today, Xavier and Victor need to have their teeth checked!

title: A helping hand
subtitle: My XL World
description: People like to help each other in Rainbow Town!

title: A Unique local landmark
subtitle: My XL World
description: Wei, Xavier, Yasmin, and Zoe are discussing what Rainbow Town's landmark should be!

title: Trash recycling
subtitle: My XL World
description: Uh-oh! Xavier dropped his ice cream on the ground. He wants to clean it up, but he can’t find a trash can in Rainbow Town.

title: City Safety
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore the different safety rules that are linked to city transportation and describe how some of them can be improved.

title: Emotional Design
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore how robots can create positive emotions in everyday situations.

title: Build my community
subtitle: My XL World
description: Let’s visit Rainbow Town, where Uma, Victor, Wei, Xavier, and Zoe live!

title: Inspection
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore how robots can be used to inspect narrow spaces.

title: Cooling Fan
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Introduces building and coding using the Motor Power Block to make the motor turn at different speeds.

title: Sequencing Stops
subtitle: Math Train
description: In this lesson, children will learn to sequence events, practice ordering numbers and hear and/or use sequential language
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Train Time
subtitle: Math Train
description: This is a getting started activity where children will begin counting as they build tracks and start exploring sequencing and order
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Check the train
subtitle: Math Train
description: In this lesson, children will practice counting, and comparing quantities and sequence numbers by using the train cars.
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Animal Senses
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Explore how animals use their senses in order to receive different types of information.

title: Patterning Train Cars
subtitle: Math Train
description: The objective of this lesson is to have children practice making patterns and recognizing patterns
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Longest Track
subtitle: Math Train
description: In this lesson, children will practice measuring, learn about standard and nonstandard measurement and compare distances and length
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Load the train
subtitle: Math Train
description: The objective of this lesson is to practice matching numbers to quantities and practice comparing quantities
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Matching numbers
subtitle: Math Train
description:
This is a getting started activity where the children will begin matching numbers to quantities and practice counting and
recognizing the number of objects
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Number Friends
subtitle: Math Train
description: In this lesson, children will learn to count and recognize the number of objects in a set, match numbers to quantities and practice simple addition
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Birthday Celebrations
subtitle: Café+
description: The objective of this lesson is for children to start counting using number names and begin to sequence numbers or events
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Food Patterns
subtitle: Café+
description: In this lesson children will start using mathematical terms, such as positional language and color and shape names, categorizing items and start recognizing and creating increasingly complex patterns
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Double Up!
subtitle: Café+
description: The objective of this lesson is for the children to start using mathematical terms, comparing two or more objects and explore simple operations, such as adding
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Café Bingo
subtitle: Café+
description: In this lesson children will learn to match shapes by one-to-one correspondence, explore 2D and 3D objects and follow the sequence of events while playing a game
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Let's Go Shopping
subtitle: Café+
description: In this lesson children will build a variety of items, learn to sort by multiple characteristics and explore price and money
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Trading Bricks
subtitle: Café+
description: The objective of this lesson is for children to explore trade and money and to follow the sequence of events while playing a game
categories: Early Math and Science, Creative Exploration

title: Our Town
subtitle: Our Community
description: Learn about different locations and people in a town.

title: Community Helpers
subtitle: Our Community
description: Learn about the role of community helpers in a town.

title: Shopping
subtitle: Our Community
description: Discuss and learn about different types of stores, groceries and shop items.

title: Public Transportation
subtitle: Our Community
description: Understand different types of public transportation.

title: Healthcare Workers
subtitle: Our Community
description: Understand the role of healthcare workers in a town.

title: Places to Eat
subtitle: Our Community
description: Be able to name different places to eat and understand what customers and servers do.

title: My Day at Preschool
subtitle: Our Community
description: Describe and understand daily routines and activities.

title: A Tour of the Town
subtitle: Our Community
description: Understand what can be seen during a tour of the town, and how a town can be unique.

title: My Extended Family
subtitle: Our Community
description: Learn about the difference between family and extended family and what it means to have a family.

title: Helping Each Other
subtitle: Our Community
description: Understand the importance of being helpful to each other.

title: Make a Digital Accessory
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Invent a digital accessory that fits your needs and ease your daily life.

title: Make a Sound Machine
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Design a sound machine and explore programming variables that make soft sounds, loud sounds, environmental sounds, rhythms, and melodies.

title: Make a Life Hack
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Create an invention to help solve one of the little problems kids face in life at home, school, and play!

title: Make a Dancing Robot
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Design and program a robot that performs a cultural dance, tells a story through dance, or dances in pairs or groups.

title: Physical Activities
subtitle: Our Community
description: Recognize and understand different types of physical activities.

title: My Home
subtitle: Our Community
description: To learn and understand characteristics of a home, and what similarities and differences there might be from home to home.

title: Moonbase
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Design a solution for a robot that would assemble a base on the moon.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Pulleys
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The pulley is a simple machine that can be used to efficiently pull forces.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Levers
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The lever is a simple machine, a rigid bar or solid Object, that is used to transfer force.

title: Go-Cart
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Identify a wheel and axle as a simple machine and where friction might be found.

title: Crazy Floors
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Explore and recognize that the turning ratio of one pulley to another is determined by the size of the pulleys.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Gears
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The gear is a simple machine that can be used to efficiently transfer force and motion.

title: Merry-Go-Round
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Explore and recognize that how fast or how slowly one gear makes another turn depends on the number of teeth on the gears and their position.

title: Catapult
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Explore and recognize that the effectiveness of a lever depends on the arrangement of the pivot point, effort and load.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Wheels and Axles
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The wheel and axle is a simple machine consisting of a big wheel and a small axle, which is secured to one another, to create movement.

title: Spy Robot
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Introduces building and coding using the Motion Sensor.

title: Moving Satellite
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Introduces building and coding using the motor further, making it turn for a set amount of time and then change direction.

title: Glowing Snail
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Introduces building and coding using the Light Block.

title: Make a Simple Machine to Move Something
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Design a simple machine that can move things.

title: Make a Mechanical Friend
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Create a mechanical friend who can do fun things with you!

title: Make a Cartoon
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Create your own animated cartoon!

title: Make an Amusement Park Ride
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Invent an amusement park ride that uses a simple machine.

title: Make a Mascot
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Create and personalize a mascot.

title: Make a Castle Mechanism or Simple Machine
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Create a mechanism or simple machine that could make life in a castle easier or safer.

title: Make a Game
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Create a game you love, or invent a new one!

subtitle: Café+
description: In this Getting Started lesson, children will explore the Café and begin counting as they build a menu item

title: Make a Classroom Helper
subtitle: Simple Machines Set

title: Make a Mechanical Toy

title: Make a Wearable
